title: Stage Lv8-C4-S27
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Being short of time, we had to make a quick decision.
Having no other choice, they accepted the offer.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 시간이 부족해서 우리는 빠른 결정을 내려야 했습니다.
sentences.en: Being short of time, we had to make a quick decision.

sentences.kr: 다른 선택이 없어서 그들은 그 제안을 받아들였습니다.
sentences.en: Having no other choice, they accepted the offer.

sentences.kr: 그 문제의 중요성을 깨달아서 우리는 즉시 조치를 취했습니다.
sentences.en: Realizing the importance of the issue, we took immediate action.

sentences.kr: 예산이 제한되어 있어서 우리는 우선순위를 정해야 했습니다.
sentences.en: Having limited budget, we had to set priorities.

sentences.kr: 경험이 부족해서 그들은 전문가의 도움을 구했습니다.
sentences.en: Lacking experience, they sought help from experts.

sentences.kr: 위험을 인식해서 우리는 더 신중한 접근을 택했습니다.
sentences.en: Recognizing the risks, we adopted a more cautious approach.

sentences.kr: 충분한 정보가 없어서 더 많은 연구가 필요했습니다.
sentences.en: Not having sufficient information, more research was needed.

sentences.kr: 기회의 중요성을 이해해서 우리는 즉시 행동했습니다.
sentences.en: Understanding the importance of the opportunity, we acted immediately.
